name: part_017
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage2 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [qBwpM98PXcI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_017.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Usada Pekora and Momosuzu Nene after their performance on stage.
End screen indicating the conclusion of the free portion of the stream.

subtitles.original: ペコねねだー！って言ってくれましたか？
subtitles.english: Did you just say "Peko-Nene"?!

subtitles.original: やり直せん、やり直せん。
subtitles.english: Let's redo it, let's redo it.

subtitles.original: こんぺこ！こんぺこ！こんぺこー！
subtitles.english: Kon-peko! Kon-peko! Kon-peko!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ3期生の兎田ぺこらぺこ！
subtitles.english: I'm Usada Pekora from hololive 3rd Gen-peko!

subtitles.original: どーも！どーも！
subtitles.english: Hello! Hello!

subtitles.original: そして、ホロライブ5期生、みんなの心の...
subtitles.english: And, from hololive 5th Gen, everyone's heart's...

subtitles.original: ...エナジードリンク、桃鈴ねねでーす！
subtitles.english: ...energy drink, Momosuzu Nene-desu!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: ペコねねー！
subtitles.english: Peko-Nene!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！わー、すごーい！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Whoa, amazing!

subtitles.original: 本当にすごーいぺこね、ねねち！
subtitles.english: It's really amazing-peko, Nene-chi!

subtitles.original: 人がすごーいぺこじゃん！すごーいぺこだよ！
subtitles.english: There are so many people-peko! It's incredible-peko!

subtitles.original: うわー！会場がデカすぎぺこじゃないですか！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Isn't this venue just way too big-peko?!

subtitles.original: すごい音響きわたってるね！
subtitles.english: The sound is echoing so well!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！
subtitles.english: Yahoo!

subtitles.original: おー、やってみて、あんたもやってみないよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, try it! Why don't you try it too?

subtitles.original: ぺこぺこぺこ！
subtitles.english: Peko, peko, peko!

subtitles.original: なになになにぺこ？
subtitles.english: What, what, what-peko?

subtitles.original: 楽しいぺこね、こうやってコール＆レスポンスするのも！
subtitles.english: It's fun-peko, doing call and response like this!

subtitles.original: 最高！
subtitles.english: It's the best!

subtitles.original: 楽しいぺこですけども...
subtitles.english: It is fun-peko, but...

subtitles.original: ぺこらたちは、さっき「未来系アイドル」をちょっと歌って踊らせて...
subtitles.english: Pekora and the others just performed "Miraikei Idol"...

subtitles.original: もらったぺこですけど、皆さん、ぺこらたちアイドルになれてましたぺこかな？
subtitles.english: ...just now-peko. Everyone, did we look like idols-peko?

subtitles.original: 嬉しいぺこですね！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy-peko!

subtitles.original: なんと今日はね、ねねち先輩！何？何？何？
subtitles.english: And today, Nene-chi senpai! What is it?

subtitles.original: なんとインドネシアでもライブビューイングがあります！
subtitles.english: There's actually a live viewing in Indonesia too!

subtitles.original: えー！マジぺこ？見てますかー？
subtitles.english: Whaaat! Really-peko? Are you watching?

subtitles.original: Halo, Indonesia! Apa kabar? Halo!
subtitles.english: Halo, Indonesia! Apa kabar? Halo!

subtitles.original: ぜひね、このライブの感想をハッシュタグ...
subtitles.english: By all means, please post your impressions of this live concert...

subtitles.original: ...#hololivefes24_EXPO_DAY1でSNSでたくさんアップしてくれると...
subtitles.english: ...with the hashtag #hololivefes24_EXPO_DAY1 on SNS!

subtitles.original: ぺこらたち嬉しいぺこだよね！お願いします！
subtitles.english: Pekora and the others would be so happy! Please do!

subtitles.original: あと、ハート、ハートほしいなー。
subtitles.english: Also, I want hearts...

subtitles.original: これもお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please give us those too!

subtitles.original: あ、待てぺこちゃん先輩、あいたー！
subtitles.english: Oh, wait, Pekora-chan senpai... Ouch!

subtitles.original: まさかこの二人だと思ったぺこなんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Didn't expect it would be the two of us-peko?

subtitles.original: 皆も驚いたでしょ！驚いたわー！どうぺこ？
subtitles.english: Everyone was surprised, right? How was it-peko?

subtitles.original: いや、僕も驚きました！ねねちも驚いたわ！
subtitles.english: Even I was surprised-peko! Nene-chi too!

subtitles.original: ぺこらはね、ねねちとが嬉しいなーって思いながら...
subtitles.english: Pekora is so happy to be with Nene-chi...

subtitles.original: このフェス楽し... 何そのダンス？
subtitles.english: ...while enjoying this fes... What's with that dance?

subtitles.original: 何何何何何ぺこ？ハレンチ！
subtitles.english: What, what, what, what-peko? How naughty!

subtitles.original: ぺこらだ、おケツが、おケツがすごいぺこですけど！
subtitles.english: Pekora, that butt... your butt is amazing-peko!

subtitles.original: いや、でも本当に...
subtitles.english: Well, but really...

subtitles.original: あ、あれする？さっきさ、コール＆レスポンス、先やっちゃったけどさ...
subtitles.english: Ah, should we do that? We did the call and response earlier, but...

subtitles.original: もう一回、もう一回あれやっとこ！
subtitles.english: Let's do it one more time!

subtitles.original: だってみんなの顔見て！真顔になっちゃった！本当だ！
subtitles.english: Look at everyone's faces! They've become so serious! It's true!

subtitles.original: 何で真顔になってるの？そんな暇ないよなー！
subtitles.english: Why are you so serious? No time for that!

subtitles.original: そうだよねー！うおおおー！
subtitles.english: That's right! Whoooo!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、聞いてみようか。いい？
subtitles.english: Well then, let me ask. Ready?

subtitles.original: 日本から来た人ー！
subtitles.english: People who came from Japan!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、海外から来た人ー！
subtitles.english: Now, people who came from overseas!

subtitles.original: わー！すごーい！多いねー！すごーい！
subtitles.english: Wow, that's amazing! So many! Amazing!

subtitles.original: すごーい、すごーい！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Amazing, amazing! Thank you!

subtitles.original: まだまだ盛り上がれますかー！
subtitles.english: Can we get even more hyped?!

subtitles.original: 嬉しいですが、なんと...
subtitles.english: We're happy to hear that, but actually...

subtitles.original: 無料パートはここまで！
subtitles.english: ...the free part ends here!

subtitles.original: 是非ともね、気になった方は概要欄からチケットが買えるので...
subtitles.english: If you're interested, you can buy tickets from the description...

subtitles.original: あ、見てくれたら嬉しいなと思います！
subtitles.english: ...so we'd be happy if you watched it!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！お願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Please do! Please!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、最後行っちゃいますか？行っちゃいましょうか、行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's go with the last one. Shall we? Let's go.

subtitles.original: せーの！Capture the Moment!
subtitles.english: Ready, set... Capture the Moment!

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました！ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: The free part has ended! Thank you for watching!
